title: godoc & go doc should behave the same
body:
by **t.brandscheid**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
The command 'godoc fmt Printf' and 'go doc fmt Printf' don't produce the same output.

What is the expected output?
'godoc fmt Printf' and 'go doc fmt Printf' should produce exactly the same output ->
print >>only<< the function documentation.

What do you see instead?
'godoc fmt Printf' prints only the function documentation of fmt.Printf, 'go doc fmt
Printf' prints instead the whole package documentation.

Which operating system are you using?
Ubuntu 13.04 64-Bit

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')
go1.1.2 linux/amd64
